Items.Title: Oversight - Unsheltered Homelessness in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Unsheltered Homelessness in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the mayor’s office of operations to report on the exits from city-administered facilities and the financings, starts and completions of permanent housing for those exiting city-administered facilities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the mayor’s office of operations to report on the exits from city-administered facilities and the financings, starts and completions of permanent housing for those exiting city-administered facilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to updating the report on utilization of and applications for multi-agency emergency housing assistance, exits from city-administered facilities and the financings, starts and completions of permanent housing for those exiting city-administered facilities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Updating the report on utilization of and applications for multi-agency emergency housing assistance, exits from city-administered facilities and the financings, starts and completions of permanent housing for those exiting city-administered facilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services and the human resources administration to track and report certain data regarding rental assistance programs
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of homeless services and the human resources administration to track and report certain data regarding rental assistance programs.
